'''Treasure Hoarder Scouting Report''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained after talking to [[Vile]] during the {{Quest|"That Guy"'s Scheme}}.

Vile gives the player 3 Treasure Hoarder Scouting Reports to be planted in the quest.
